headline: CrowdStrike and Qualtrics Extend Security for Customer and Employee Experience Programs with New Integration
summary: AUSTIN, Texas & PROVO, Utah & SEATTLE, February 19, 2026--CrowdStrike (NASDAQ: CRWD) and Qualtrics today announced a new integration that adds a new layer of security to customer and employee experience programs, giving organizations real-time visibility to detect and address risks proactively.

headline: CrowdStrike (CRWD) Teams Up With Qualtrics To Secure Employee Experience Data
summary: CRWD shares up premarket as company announces integration with Qualtrics to enhance security for customer and employee experiences. Mixed market performance, stock facing bearish trend and sector challenges. Key resistance: $487. Key support: $374.50.

headline: Microsoft’s Global South AI Bet and Rising Scrutiny Could Be A Game Changer For Microsoft (MSFT)
summary: In February 2026, Microsoft announced plans to invest US$50.00 billion by 2030 to expand AI infrastructure and skills across the Global South, while partners such as CrowdStrike, Capgemini and TeamDynamix deepened their use of Azure and the Microsoft Marketplace ecosystem. At the same time, analyst downgrades and questions about whether rising AI and data center spending will translate into profitable products have put Microsoft’s AI strategy and capital allocation under intense...

headline: CrowdStrike And Qualtrics Announce New Security Integration
summary: The integration connects CrowdStrike Falcon® Shield with the Qualtrics XM Platform to provide organizations with real-time visibility and automated protection for user activity, permission, configurations, and data
